To all such as complain that they want power, not applying themselves to yeild [sic] subjection to what of God is made manifest in them, upon a pretence of waiting for power so to do Penington, Isaac, 1616-1679.
16 p.
Printed for Robert Wilson ..., [London : 1661]
Caption title. Imprint from colophon. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
